\n


Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with marketing team members to understand design needs and objectives

  • Portfolio demonstrating strong visual design skills and creativity
  • Proficiency with design software (Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar)
  • Proficiency with generative AI
  • Video editing skills
  • Experience with motion graphics or animation
  • Understanding of design principles and current visual trends

  • Strong attention to detail and time management skills
  • Interest in or knowledge of cybersecurity or data protection concepts (Nice to have)


What we Offer

  • Opportunity to build a portfolio of work in the tech security space
